name: Deep Pression
description:
This was a project made for a videogame class, it's still a work in progress but I hope I will be able to continue with it. 

This is also the first game I make so I would appreciate any feedback that you have for me, thank you in advance.

Disclaimer:

Although I did a small part of the art, namely the kitchen, the intersection, the upstairs floor of the school and the classroom, all of the other backgrounds, as well as the two characters were made by an amazing artist, so I would appreciate if you would check her page out. ^^ 

The artist---> https://www.facebook.com/PikiiDylluan/?ref=br_rshttps://www.instagram.com/pikiidylluan/
